business_description: A leading Fast Moving Electrical Goods (FMEG) company in India, manufacturing and distributing a wide range of products including industrial & domestic circuit protection devices, cables, motors, fans, switches, home appliances, and consumer durables under the Lloyd brand.
target_audience: Residential homeowners, architects, interior designers, industrial and commercial businesses, and government institutions requiring electrical and consumer durable solutions.

faq_and_pricing.answer: Havells offers a vast portfolio of electrical goods including **fans, lighting, modular switches, water heaters, and home appliances.** We also manufacture industrial goods like cables, wires, motors, and switchgears.

Warranty periods vary by product category (typically **1-2 years** for small appliances and up to **5 years** for specific LED or fan components). We also offer Extended Warranty and Annual Maintenance Contracts (AMC).
We provide doorstep service through **'Havells Connect'**. Customers can book services or log complaints via our 24x7 customer care, WhatsApp support, or the Havells Sync App.
Through our brand **Lloyd**, we offer heavy-duty consumer durables including Air Conditioners, LED TVs, Washing Machines, and Refrigerators tailored for the Indian market.
